#summary Commands for installing phyloloc in ubuntu

= Introduction =

For installing phyloloc in ubuntu, please follow the next steps.

= Details =

  # Install qt
    # sudo apt-get install qtcreator
  # Install mili library
    # svn checkout http://mili.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ mili-read-only
    # The previous command downloads mili in the folder mili-read-only.
      # cd mili-read-only
      # sudo ./install.sh
  # Download and compile phyloloc
    # svn checkout http://phyloloc.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ phyloloc-read-only
    # The previous command generates the folder phyloloc-read-only.
      # cd phyloloc-read-only/src
      # make
  # Run phyloloc
      # ./phyloloc
